Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Park Ranger
Reviews.Content: I have only had this computer for 2 days but I already love it!  It is so user friendly.  The 17.3" screen, Windows 7, and the 6 GB are a great combination.  It is still thin and light even with the DVD writer.  I have no problem while gaming.  I would recommend the Aspire E1-771-6458 to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: Works great for what I needed it for, obviously won't play many games, but it's a nice little thing to go on the internet, or do work related things.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this laptop!
Reviews.Author: Sanya Rae
Reviews.Content: So happy I replaced my very lame HP for this Acer Aspire, it has met all of my expectations and more.  Highly recommend it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i3-3110M 2.4 GHz
6 GB DDR3
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: Acer Aspire NX.MG7AA.006;E1-771-6458 17.3-Inch Laptop
